title: Would you Rather but global
desc:
Post 1551
- Choose 2 sides for the "Would You Rather" question that will send to at least 3 people of your choosing
- You may choose yourself if you have at least 3 cards
- Choose which of the 2 sides results in a card being discarded, the other will have a card being drawn
- A message to all people you chose will be sent with something to the effect of "Would you rather (side 1) or (side 2)?"
- The people then choose a side and draw or discard depending on the side you chose for that
